exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat so handles align with mid-chest, back flat against pad
Execution: Push handles forward with controlled motion, pause briefly at full extension
Form cue: Keep shoulders back and avoid locking elbows completely

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Setup: Sit with feet planted, grab handle with neutral grip, chest up
Execution: Pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together
Form cue: Avoid using momentum, keep torso stable throughout movement

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust thigh pad, grip bar wider than shoulder-width
Execution: Pull bar down to upper chest, lean back slightly
Form cue: Focus on pulling with lats, not arms, control the negative

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raises
instructions: Setup: Set cable at lowest position, stand sideways to machine
Execution: Raise arm out to side until parallel with floor
Form cue: Slight bend in elbow, lead with pinky finger, control descent

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Setup: Stand facing cable machine, rope or bar attachment at chest height
Execution: Push attachment down keeping elbows at sides
Form cue: Keep elbows stationary, squeeze triceps at bottom

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit in machine, feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Execution: Lower weight until knees reach 90 degrees, press through heels
Form cue: Keep knees aligned with toes, don't lock knees at top

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curls
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and leg pad, sit with back flat
Execution: Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings at top
Form cue: Control both lifting and lowering phases, full range of motion

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and leg pad, sit with back supported
Execution: Extend legs until straight, pause and squeeze quads
Form cue: Don't swing weight up, control the negative portion

exercises.name: Cable Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Setup: Stand facing low cable with rope or bar attachment
Execution: Hinge at hips, keep slight knee bend, lower with straight back
Form cue: Push hips back, feel stretch in hamstrings, drive hips forward to return

exercises.name: Calf Press on Leg Press
instructions: Setup: Position balls of feet on bottom edge of leg press platform
Execution: Press through balls of feet, full range of motion
Form cue: Pause at top contraction, control the stretch at bottom

exercises.name: Incline Treadmill Walk
instructions: Setup: Set treadmill to 3-4 mph with 5-8% incline
Execution: Maintain steady pace, pump arms naturally, breathe rhythmically

exercises.name: Dynamic Warm-up
instructions: Step 1: Arm circles forward and backward 10 each
Step 2: Leg swings front to back and side to side 10 each leg
Step 3: Hip circles and torso twists 10 each direction

exercises.name: Full Body Stretch Routine
instructions: Step 1: Hold each stretch for 30-60 seconds, breathe deeply
Step 2: Target chest, shoulders, hip flexors, hamstrings, calves
Step 3: Use stretching mats in designated area, focus on tight areas from workouts

sources.title: How Dopamine & Serotonin Shape Decisions, Motivation & Learning | Dr. Read Montague
Essentials: Using Play to Rewire & Improve Your Brain
Navigating the complex relationship between statins, GLP-1, and glycemic control
Science & Tools of Learning & Memory | Dr. David Eagleman
